name: Dodgeball (itch) (ashish)
description:
You come across this thousands of years old hidden temple and accidentally set a trap meant for its safety. You are stunned to find that its a high security facility with automated guards suddenly woke  after a long hibernation period.  Your only way to survive is to use the EMPs (also put for temple safety) against the automated electronic guards. 

Pick, Plant & Detonate. 

Good thing is  that the EMPs only work on enemies. But always be on your toes, if the enemies spot you they will find you and kill you.

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move the Player
  • Run over the EMPs to collect (You can carry only 1 at a time)
  • Press Z to plant an EMP
  • Press X to detonate EMP 

- You may plan and plant all the bombs first and detonate at once or choose to do so one by one. Plan Well!

- You need to kill all the enemies to WIN
